name: OnlyIntegers
description: Find only integer numbers in an expression
content:
Match
SUM([Aantal]160/ü100 )
SUM([Aantal].Value * (160 / 100))
SUM([Aantal].Value * ( a]160 / 100 ) )
SUM((160/5E5) / [Aantal].Value)
SUM([Aantal].Value + (160/100 / (10 * 30)))
SUM([Aantal].Value * (160/100) + [Test].Value)
SUM([Aantal].Value * 160/100)
SUM([Aantal].Value * 160/+125)

No Match
SUM([Aantal360].Value)
SUM([360Aantal360].Value)
SUM([Aantal].Value - 160a.3/100.4)
SUM([Aantal].Value * 160,1/100,5)
SUM([Aantal].Value / (160a.4/100.5))
SUM([Aantal].Value / (160.4/100.5))
SUM([Aantal].Value * (160,4/100,5))
SUM([Aantal360].Value * (160.1 / [Test12].ID))

10000
(160/
(160/
